title: New: Boniface – I Will Not Return As A Tourist
body:
Adore the songwriting from Winnipeg’s **Boniface** on his stunning debut track, _I Will Not Return As A Tourist_.

Storytelling writing is an increasingly lost art, especially when successfully combining it with the sort of epic, over-the-top production as found here. At it’s heart, it’s pop music, just with so much more personality than you might expect. Check it out below.

At it’s heart, it’s pop music, just with so much more personality than you might \[…\]
